_comments.ParticlesAllChance: [Value between 0.0 and 1.0] Turns down particles when in ALL mode. Ex. 0.1 will make 10% of particles DECREASED. Basically a dial between ALL and DECREASED.
_comments.ParticlesDecreasedChance: [Value between 0.0 and 1.0] Turns down particles when in DECREASED mode. Ex. 0.1 will make 10% of particles MINIMAL. Basically a dial between DECREASED and MINIMAL.
_comments.ParticlesByType: Map of Particle Type to spawn chance. Ex. {"minecraft:smoke": 0.3, "minecraft:capfire_cozy_smoke": 0.3} (without the backslashes) will cause Smoke and Campfire particles to spawn at 30% of their normal rate. separate entries with a comma.
_comments.DisableParticles: [true or false] Completely turns off all particles on the client.

Disable_Optimizations_Options.ROTATION: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to vertex rotation caching (ParticleManagerRotationMixin, BillboardParticleMixin)
Disable_Optimizations_Options.CULLING: [Impact: High] Disables mixins related to particle culling (FrustumAccessor, ParticleAccessor, ParticleManagerFrustumMixin, WorldRendererFrustumMixin)
Disable_Optimizations_Options.TYPE: [Impact: Low to Medium] Disables mixins related to particle disabling and reduction (WorldRendererTypeMixin)
Disable_Optimizations_Options.DECREASE: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related particle settings reduction (ALL, DECREASED, MINIMAL) (WorldRendererDecreaseMixin)
Disable_Optimizations_Options.LIGHTMAP: [Impact: Medium] Disables mixins related to light map caching (ParticleManagerCachedLightMixin, ParticleMixin)
Disable_Optimizations_Options.POTION: [Impact: Low] Disables mixins related to potion particle disabling (LivingEntityMixin)
